title: (x) Crailtap font - Too Much {David Hubner}
content:
Just discovered this font in a skate magazine   
Looking on internet i've found this example   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35092.gif)   
   
It reminds me frankfurter or biff without light effects.   
If someone's got an clue.
author: bender

comments.content:
The font is named 'Too Much'..   
( As revealed by Grant Hutchinson, in the thread linked below.. Thanks, Grant.. )   
   
The 'Crailtap' type has been questioned here before.:   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21436.html?1070041790](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133605/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/21436.html?1070041790)

Oups sorry !   
   
i've trying the search method but i don't know why it takes several minutes on i.e (OS X) to load me the results ...

No problem, at all..   
The Typophile server is pretty slow to react, sometimes, due to the massive load of traffic, I assume..

Ian, I can sell you a 'lightly' used Image Club Letterpress 7.0 collection which includes the three weights of Too Much (along with the rest of the Image Club library - circa 1997). If you're interested, please contact me via [my Typophile profile](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133605/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-profile.pl?action=view_profile&profile=grant-users).
... or is it the quirky code slowing it down? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415133605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

hi does anyone know where this font is availible?   
   
I can't find it anywhere. but would really like to get my hands on it.
